entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:32 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 09:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
